dict.string: Improved integration with ONLYOFFICE DocSpace v2.6
Sign in to your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace and access the new features of version 2.6.
Quick action toolbar in editors on iPhone
Quickly perform essential document tasks on your iPhone using the new quick action toolbar.
Creation and editing of table of contents
Create and manage your table of contents in the Document Editor.
Switch to tile view to browse your files more visually and find what you need faster.
